Translations.Text: Have they nie zasluzit si GOD's retribution by zapudit others Sacred Masjid vecer though they nie bol custodians thereof? true custodians thereof som righteous vela z them nie zauzlit
Ich Zmluva Prayers (Salat) shrine (Ka bah) je ziaden inak than mockery vyznam zapudit ludia zhluk them out)! Therefore suffer retribution tvoj disbelief
Those disbelieve spend ich peniaze zapudit others way GOD They spend it potom it turn into zalost remorse them. Ultimately they defeated all disbelievers zvolat do Hell
GOD will sift away ZLY Z DOBRY POTOM pile ZLY on top z each inak, all DO 1 pile POTOM throw it Hell! Such bol losers
Tell those disbelieved they zastavit all ich minuly forgiven! Lenze if they spatny listok they incur same fate ich previous counterparts
Ona boj them zverenec oppression practice tvoj nabozenstvo devoted do GOD alone they zdrzat sa aggression potom GOD je fully Seer z everything they robit
they turn potom ona zauzlit lenze GOD bol tvoj Lord Zvladnut; dobry Lord Zvladnut lepsie supporter
